pre-build.command:
case "$PWD" in
  */.mooncakes/*)
    ROOT="${PWD%%/.mooncakes/*}"
    mkdir -p "$ROOT/vendor"
    if [ ! -e "$ROOT/vendor/wgpu-native" ]; then
      ln -s ".mooncakes/Milky2018/wgpu_mbt/vendor/wgpu-native" "$ROOT/vendor/wgpu-native"
    fi
    ;;
esac
cargo build --manifest-path $input --release --no-default-features --features metal,wgsl
